notes: Luxury resort wear born from Le Sirenuse hotel in Positano. Famous for caftans, swimwear and vibrant Mediterranean prints. Founded by Carla Sersale in 2013.
Italian swimwear brand est. 2015 by Jannine Vinci and Isabella Cavallin. Made in Riccione, Italy. Name from French 'Oser' meaning to dare. Luxury lurex swim and resort wear.
Resort wear brand for women and men, founded in Italy in 2000. Inspired by the Breton coast. Known for hand-painted cashmere, luxurious linens, and signature dyeing processes.
Handmade espadrilles designed in Italy, crafted in Spain. Expanded to swimwear, bags and full resort wear collections. Men's and women's vacation essentials.
Greek resort wear brand inspired by folk and traditional techniques. Universally flattering silhouettes crafted from silk or cotton with embroidery accents.
Greek family business run by designer Athina and husband Dimitris. Boho resort wear inspired by Grecian culture. 1,500+ points of sale in 40+ countries since 2013.
Founded 2001 by Rosa Esteva. Artisanal approach with sustainability and purity at heart. Limited edition collections in natural fabrics, handcrafted in Barcelona and Mallorca.
Barcelona-based label drawing inspiration from travel, vintage references, and Mediterranean lifestyle. Relaxed tailoring, crochet details, and soft linens.
Founded 2010 by Creative Director Gul Agis. Vacation-perfect patterns, embroidery work, and soft feminine shapes. Emphasizes sustainable living and craftsmanship.
Danish design silk swimwear and resort dresses by mother-daughter duo. Made ethically in Portugal. Italian and Turkish fabrics. Launched 2008 after Hanne left Missoni.
Luxury British resort wear. Curated collection of dresses, kaftans, and separates. Known for feminine silhouettes and quality fabrics.
Luxury swimwear and beachwear brand based in Chelsea, London. Flagship store on Pavilion Road. Premium resort wear and swimwear collections.
Sustainable resort, beach, sleep and loungewear brand. Focus on timeless design, conscious materials, and quality. Silk and linen focused collections.
Sustainable luxury resort wear designed in London. Uses 100% GOTS-certified organic Belgian linen and recycled fabrics. High-fashion sustainable resort pieces.
Iconic British swim and resort wear brand since 2015. Known for Original Crinkle signature material. One-size-fits-all concept. Designed and produced in London.
British designer resort wear since 2012. Dreamy silk dresses and timeless cotton styles. Sizes XS-5XL. Specializes in luxury vacation and cruise wear.
Brazilian-born luxury swimwear pioneer in the US. Special finish on swimsuits featuring leather, ropes, metal, straw or resin. Stores in Newport Beach and Coral Gables.
Brazilian designer known for craft, color, and romantic sensibility. Hand embroidery, lacework, and fabric manipulation. Flagship store in Ipanema, Rio de Janeiro.
Founded 1989 in Rio by Oskar Metsavaht. Brazil's premier luxury brand combining sophisticated design with sustainability. Organic materials, recycled fabrics, fair-trade production.
Peruvian resort wear brand est. 1987 by siblings Liliana and Jorge Villalobos. Leader swimwear company in Peru producing 6,000+ pieces/month. Made from finest Italian fabrics.
Founded 2003 by sisters Manuela and Amalia Sierra. Colorful, playful, reversible swimwear. B Corp certified. Present in 57 countries with 15 stores in Americas.
Colombian-made resort wear brand. Figure-flattering swimwear with perfect balance of support and sexiness. Founder Mauricio Esquenazi based in Miami.
Launched 2017 by Buenos Aires-born Sofia Sanchez de Betak. Sustainable fabrics and hand-painted patterns. Vacation resort wear with artisanal South American touch.
Sustainable luxury resort wear inspired by artisan textiles of Oaxaca. Hand loomed and hand knotted by artisans in Mexico. Showroom by appointment only.
Miami-based designer tropical resort swimwear and outfits. Sexy, colorful resort wear with Latin flair. Flagship stores in Miami Beach and Miami.
NYC-based luxury swimwear and resort wear founded 2009 by Carl Cunow and Nathan Romano. Men's and women's swim and resort collections.
High fashion swim and resort wear. Designed in LA with stores in NYC. Known for scalloped edge detailing and elegant resort pieces.
Australian-born designer, label launched 2017 in LA. Airy, light resort wear with laidback elegance. Ethical production with Bali artisans.
Caribbean-inspired resort wear by Grenadian designer Felisha Noel. Flowy wide-legged pants, cropped bralettes, and chic caftans in stunning tropical motifs. Based in Brooklyn.
Luxury kaftans and resort wear. Sierra Leonean heritage meets global luxury. Worn by Beyonce, Gabrielle Union, Iman. Rising Star nominee Fashion Group International 2020.
Founded 2007 by supermodel Liya Kebede to preserve Ethiopian weaving traditions. Artisan-driven sustainable resort and swimwear. All made responsibly in Africa.
Luxury resort and loungewear brand handmade in Negril, Jamaica. Caftans, swimsuits, and loungewear. Women-owned, sustainable brand.
Conscious luxury travel brand with Indian design roots. Hand-illustrated prints, fine embroideries, sustainable fabrics. Store in Arpora, Goa.
Synonymous with luxury Indian resort wear. Sophisticated designs and elegant silhouettes for discerning summer travelers. Headquartered in Haryana, India.
Founded 1994 by Italian designer Susanna Perini. Pioneered sophisticated resort wear in Indonesia. Blends Indonesian lifestyle with Italian design. Flagship in Seminyak.
French designer based in Bali since 2002. Sophisticated bohemian dresses with French influence. 5 boutiques across Bali. Parisian chic meets island vibe.
Bali-based resort wear collaborating with local artisans. Entirely handmade beachwear, swimwear and knitwear. Sustainable materials, plant-based dyes, fair labor.
Nigerian-founded, Toronto/NYC-based. Inspired by color, ethnic cultures, and nature. Contemporary yet retro resort wear. Store on Bleecker St, NYC.
Proudly Made in Ghana luxury brand launched 2008 by Aisha Ayensu. Named after grandmother. Vibrant prints and intricate patterns celebrating African craftsmanship.
100% Made In Africa label, designed and produced in Dakar. Celebrity fans include Beyonce, Naomi Campbell, Alicia Keys. Fast Company's 50 Most Innovative Companies 2020.
Zanzibar-based designer. Ultra-feminine, breezy silhouettes with hand-crafted motifs. Kanga prints from Swahili coastline. Studied in Switzerland, returned to Tanzania.
Contemporary Australian fashion brand. Known for effortless resort wear, elegant dresses and feminine silhouettes. Based in Rosebery, NSW.
Founded 2013. Timeless Australian pieces at intersection of minimalism and understated luxury. Known for elevated tailoring and resort-ready pieces.
Australian designer since 2010. Known for skin-baring designs that look endlessly classy. Master of cut-out silhouettes and elegant minimalism. Based in Redfern, NSW.
Premium Australian leisurewear. Organic cotton, silk, and terry towelling. Delicate bralettes, two-piece sets and crocheted dresses. Quality, comfort and style.
Noosa-based contemporary resort wear in luxury linen and cottons. Exclusive prints designed in collaboration with local artists. Quintessential Australian beach lifestyle.
Contemporary women's wear from Dubai Design District. Modern take on abayas and resort wear. Worn by Beyonce, Melissa McCarthy, Sophia Bush. Founded 2013.
London-based luxury resort wear founded 2016 by Kalita Al Swaidi. Known for flowing silhouettes and effortless vacation dresses. Stocked at Net-a-Porter and Lane Crawford.
LA-based online destination for high quality resort wear and swim. Curates top resort brands alongside their own collections. Contemporary vacation clothing.
Luxury swimwear and resort wear with Turkish roots, London-based. Handcrafted designer pieces. Made in Antalya and Istanbul, Turkey.
